title: Design Matters from the Archive: Krista Tippet
description: On this podcast Debbie talks to Krista Tippet about her religious orientation, her struggle with depression, and about why it’s so hard to understand our historical moment.
itunes:subtitle: On this podcast Debbie talks to Krista Tippet about her religious orientation,  her struggle with depression, and about why it’s so hard to understand  our historical moment.
